body: Zimbabwe's model constitution is now online: "We have just included all the content from the Model Constitution compiled by the Law Society of Zimbabwe into our indexed online constitution resource. Visitors to our site are now able to browse through this lengthy document..."

title: Zimbabwe: Zimbabwe's model constitution now online

sentence: Zimbabwe's model constitution is now online: "We have just included all the content from the Model Constitution compiled by the Law Society of Zimbabwe into our indexed online constitution resource.
Visitors to our site are now able to browse through this lengthy document..."
